scripts.start-full:win32: truffle compile --compile-all && truffle migrate --reset && robocopy build/contracts src/contracts && npm start nf start -p 3000
scripts.start-full:darwin:linux: truffle compile --compile-all && truffle migrate --reset && cp -f -r ./build/contracts ./src && npm start nf start -p 3000
scripts.build-full:win32: truffle compile --compile-all && truffle migrate --reset && robocopy build/contracts src/contracts && react-scripts build
scripts.build-full:darwin:linux: truffle compile --compile-all && truffle migrate --reset && cp -f -r ./build/contracts ./src && react-scripts build
